reviewText: Warning This Is a TROMA Film! For those who do not like trash this is a VERY BAD THING.
Quite slow moving and nothing like the artwork.  It is only worth a watch if you want to say you've seen a worse love story than Twilight.
That would be no stars if that was an option.

Surprisingly well written and directed this is a major departure from the other movies produced by Troma. While definitely intended to be a comedy this movie relies more on dialogue, irony, and character development as opposed to just being wacky. It's definitely slow paced and it's only barely a horror movie, if it even is one at all.

I think the guy who directed this wound up becoming a philosophy professor, somewhere, which really shows in the dialogue and situations explored by the characters. Don't let the low budget and amateurish acting deceive you, this is a really smart movie.
I thought it was great. And it is quite rare. Great 80s genre. If you love the 80s like I do. Thanks seller for making a rare movie available.
It's was an OK older movie.
It was a bad movie. I watched until the end waiting to see the vampire. The premise was good but it got lost..

Worst movie ever!!!  a COMPLETE waste of my time!!  Horrible acting, horrible script, horrible filmography, horrible sound and sound effects!!  I would call this a "class F" movie!

I can't believe that this was even accepted by Amazon for its viewers!!  If you want to waste your time, watch it.  I skipped around to see if it ever got any better, but this movie should have been titled, "Dumb and Dumbest!!"
It's alright. It is not a hard movie to watch when you are super tired
